document.heading: SOUTHWEST WATERFRONT REDEVELOPMENT CLARIFICATION ACT OF 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-359, the “Southwest Waterfront Redevelopment Clarification Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-1075, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-709 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-359 became effective on April 8, 2011.
